TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackingDataItem extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a single item of data extracted from a workflow and all its associated annotations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record to the tracking service. An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> may contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects that specify data to be extracted from the workflow and returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>. A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> represents a single item of this extracted data in either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets and sets the list of annotations associated with the extracted data.
Docs.value: A that contains the annotations associated with the extracted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> can specify annotations to be sent with the extracted data. These are contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Annotations%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the extracted data associated with the .
Docs.value: An that represents the extracted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Data%2A> contains the member data, specified by an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>, that was extracted from the workflow instance.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property or field associated with the extracted data.
Docs.value: The dot delineated name of the property or field that was extracted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The runtime tracking infrastructure supports data extraction on fields and properties of classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>; a member of such a field or property; and a single item of a field or a property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, for example a single element in a collection. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A> contains the dot delineated name of the item extracted and is equivalent to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> depending on which type of extract specified the data contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>.
